channel.title: [PI] Massacred World UNIQUE FEATURES Loads Fixed GODWARS And GAMBLING
channel.description:
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/20ppvrn.png[/img] I quit rsps
Info This source is one I worked on for a while, and I've fixed pretty much every single bug (apart from skiller ones :P) that I could find. If you are looking for a source you can just download and run then this is the one for you.
NO ANTILEECH that is retarded. If you are going to rip something from it and release PLEASE CREDIT ME and if you are going to download and host PLEASE POST to bump the thread.
If you are going to copy and paste this download to other forums give me 100% credits please. While im on the subject 80% credits to sanity for the base 0.0001% to iliketoown for changing a variable I missed when I was sleepy and 19.9999% credits to me for adding loads of stuff and fixing bugs.
Download
Source: * Client: *
Features Code:
- Improved DFS - Godwars - Gambling System - NPC that locks XP - NPC that resets stats - Fixed almost all bugs - Random events - 474 anims + configured - 474 gfx + configured - 474 objects + configured - Clan chat - Fixed NPC's - All specs work - Barrelchest anchor - Penance armors etc working - Edited loads - Fixed all dupes - FULL donator system - Loads more I CBF to remember
Media Full Gambling System [img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/9994/clip1waa043.gif[/img] Godwars [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/9477/advertpic.png[/img] Random Events: [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/rjl9on.png[/img] Home: [img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/9875/homevm.png[/img] Highscores: [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/4230/highscorespk.png[/img] Resetting stats: [img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/2315/resetstats.png[/img] Locking Exp: [img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/5883/lockedexp.png[/img]
Loads more features.
